GSD.description:
media: imx-jpeg: fix a bug of accessing array out of bounds

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit e209e6db2e527db6a93b14c2deedf969caca78fc. For more details please see the references link.
